ã‚‚ã†å¿˜ã‚Œã¦ã‚‹ã‚ˆã€‚è‡ªåˆ†ã§èª­ã¿è§£ã„ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã‹ã€‚xyå¹³é¢ã‚’é€šå¸¸ã®mod()ã§åˆ†å‰²ã€‚zè»¸ã®å¥¥è¡Œã®ã¿gridã‚’seedã«ä¹±æ•°ã‚’ä½¿ã„é–“å¼•ãã—ã¦ã‚‹ã€‚zè»¸ã ã‘ç©ºé–“ç§»å‹•ã®ã‚¹ãƒ”ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã€å›è»¢ã‚’å¤‰ãˆã¦ã‚‹ã€‚ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¯ãƒˆå¯¾ç­–ã§ã€min(map(p), 1.0)ã‚’ä½¿ã„rayã®é•·ã•ã‚’åˆ¶é™ã€‚effectã«ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ä½¿ã„ç™ºå…‰ã‚’æ¼”å‡ºã€‚

æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«ã€ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ ãªä½ç½®ã¨å¤§ãã•ã‚’ã‚‚ã¤å°æƒ‘æ˜Ÿã®è·é›¢é–¢æ•°ã¯ã“ã†ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

float dGomi(vec3 p) {
    // ã‚¢ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¯ãƒˆå¯¾ç­–ã®ãŸã‚ã®å›ºå®šé•·ã®è·é›¢
    float d = 1.0;

    // ã‚°ãƒªãƒƒãƒˆï¼ˆ4må››æ–¹ã®ç«‹æ–¹ä½“ï¼‰ã®è¨ˆç®—
    vec3 g = vec3(floor(p / 4.0));

    // åº§æ¨™ã®ç¹°ã‚Šè¿”ã—
    p = mod(p, 4.0) - 2.0;

    // ç¢ºç‡ rate ã«å¿œã˜ã¦çƒä½“ã‚’é…ç½®
    vec3 rand = hash33(g);
    float rate = (gPlanetsId != PLANETS_EARTH) ? 0.08 : 0.01;
    if (rand.x < rate) {
        p -= (rand - 0.5);
        d = sdSphere(p, 0.1 * rand.y);
    }

    // fbmã§è¡¨é¢ã®å‡¹å‡¸ã®ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’åŠ ãˆã‚‹
    // ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãŒæ¥è¿‘ã—ãŸã¨ãã ã‘ã«è¨ˆç®—ã™ã‚‹ã®ã¯ã€LODã«ã‚ˆã‚‹è² è·å¯¾ç­–
    // fbmã®è¨ˆç®—ã¯ã‹ãªã‚Šé«˜è² è·ãªã®ã§ã€LODã‚’ã—ãªã„ã¨æ¿€é‡ã«ãªã‚‹
    if (d < 0.5) {
        vec2 uv = uvSphere(normalize(p));
        uv.x += dot(rand, vec3(1.0));
        d -= remapTo(rand.z, 0.01, 0.08) * fbm(uv, 5.0);
    }

    return d;
}

ãã“ã§ã€O, F, E, S ã‚’é–¢æ•°ãƒã‚¯ãƒ­ã¨ã—ã€16åˆ†éŸ³ç¬¦ã‚’æœ€å°å˜ä½ã¨ã—ã¦å„éŸ³ç¬¦ã‚’16bitï¼ˆã†ã¡ã€ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒŠãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãŒ8bitã€éŸ³ã®é•·ã•ãŒ8bitï¼‰ãšã¤ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚­ãƒ³ã‚°ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ GLSLã®intã¯32bitãªã®ã§ã€inté…åˆ—ã®1è¦ç´ ã«16åˆ†éŸ³ç¬¦ãªã‚‰2ã¤ã€8åˆ†éŸ³ç¬¦ãªã‚‰1ã¤å…¥ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªè¨­è¨ˆã§ã™ã€‚

ã¾ãŸã€ãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³é€²è¡Œã® D ã‚‚ãƒã‚¯ãƒ­ã«ã—ã¦ã„ã¦ã€è¦ç´ æ•°ã®ç¯€ç´„ã®ãŸã‚ã«4bitãšã¤ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚­ãƒ³ã‚°ã‚’ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

ç¶šã„ã¦ã€bass ã¯æ™‚é–“ã¨ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒŠãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã¨ã—ã¦ã€æ³¢å½¢ã‚’å‡ºåŠ›ã™ã‚‹ã‚ªã‚·ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã®GLSLé–¢æ•°ã§ã™ã€‚

SEQUENCER ã¯ã€æ™‚é–“ã€ãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³ã®å®šç¾©ã®é…åˆ—ã€ãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³ã®é€²è¡Œã®é…åˆ—ã€ã‚ªã‚·ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã®é–¢æ•°ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã€ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãƒˆã”ã¨ã®æ³¢å½¢ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¦ vec2 ret ã«ä»£å…¥ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°ãƒã‚¯ãƒ­ã§ã™ã€‚ GLSLã§ã¯é–¢æ•°ã‚’å¼•æ•°ã¨ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªé«˜éšé–¢æ•°ã¯å®Ÿç¾ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€é–¢æ•°ãƒã‚¯ãƒ­ã§æ“¬ä¼¼çš„ã«å®Ÿç¾ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

#define SEQUENCER(beat, time, beatLen, devPat, devLen, notes, development, toneFunc)  \
    int indexOffset = development[int(                                                \
        mod(beat / float(beatLen * DEV_PACK), float(devLen / DEV_PACK)))];            \
    indexOffset =                                                                     \
        (indexOffset >> (4 * int(mod(beat / float(beatLen), float(DEV_PACK))))) & 15; \
    indexOffset *= beatLen * NOTE_VDIV;                                               \
                                                                                      \
    for (int i = 0; i < beatLen * NOTE_VDIV;) {                                       \
        int index = i + indexOffset;                                                  \
        int shift = (index % 2 == 1) ? 16 : 0;                                        \
        int div = ((notes[index >> 1] >> shift) >> 8) & 255;                          \
        int len = NOTE_VDIV * NOTE_VDIV / div;                                        \
        for (int j = 0; j < len; j++) {                                               \
            tmpIndexes[i + j] = i;                                                    \
        }                                                                             \
        i += len;                                                                     \
    }                                                                                 \
                                                                                      \
    float indexFloat = mod(beat * float(NOTE_VDIV), float(beatLen * NOTE_VDIV));      \
    int index = int(indexFloat);                                                      \
    int shift = (index % 2 == 1) ? 16 : 0;                                            \
    int note = (notes[(index + indexOffset) >> 1] >> shift) & 255;                    \
    float localTime =                                                                 \
        beatToTime((indexFloat - float(tmpIndexes[index])) / float(NOTE_VDIV));       \
    float amp = (note == 0) ? 0.0 : 1.0;                                              \
    vec2 ret = vec2(toneFunc(float(note), localTime) * amp);

Bounding Box

Bounding Boxã‚’å®šç¾©ã™ã‚‹Programã§ã™ã€‚

ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚°ã®ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®Bounding Boxã¯C++å´ã‹ã‚‰å€¤ã‚’æ¸¡ã™ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

rtDeclareVariable ã§CPUã‹ã‚‰GPUã¸é€ã‚‹ãƒãƒƒãƒ•ã‚¡ã®å®£è¨€ï¼ˆGLSLã®unifromã¨åŒã˜ï¼‰ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

#include <optix_world.h>

rtDeclareVariable(float3, center, , );
rtDeclareVariable(float3, size, , );

RT_PROGRAM void bounds(int, float result[6])
{
    optix::Aabb* aabb = (optix::Aabb*)result;
    aabb->m_min = center - size;
    aabb->m_max = center + size;
}

Intersection

è¡çªåˆ¤å®šã‚’ã™ã‚‹Programã§ã™ã€‚

ã”ãã”ãæ™®é€šã®ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚°ã§ã™ã€‚

rtDeclareVariable(int, lgt_instance, , ) = {0};
rtDeclareVariable(float3, texcoord, attribute texcoord, );
rtDeclareVariable(int, lgt_idx, attribute lgt_idx, );

RT_PROGRAM void intersect(int primIdx)
{
    const float EPS = 1e-2;
    float t = 0.0, d = 1e100;
    float3 p = ray.origin;

    for (int i = 0; i < 50; i++)
    {
        d = map(p);
        t += d;
        p = ray.origin + t * ray.direction;
        if (abs(d) < EPS)
        {
            break;
        }
    }

    if (abs(d) < EPS && rtPotentialIntersection(t))
    {
        shading_normal = geometric_normal = calcNormal(p, map);
        texcoord = make_float3(p.x, p.y, 0);
        lgt_idx = lgt_instance;
        rtReportIntersection(0);
    }
}

æ³•ç·šè¨ˆç®—ã¯å››é¢ä½“ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒã‚’ç”¨ã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

é€šå¸¸ã¯6å›ã®è·é›¢é–¢æ•°ã®è©•ä¾¡ãŒå¿…è¦ãªã¨ã“ã‚ã€4å›ã®è©•ä¾¡ã ã‘ã§æ³•ç·šã‚’è¨ˆç®—ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

mapé–¢æ•°ã‚’å·®ã—æ›¿ãˆå¯èƒ½ã«ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ãƒã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚’ã¤ã‹ã£ã¦å®Ÿè£…ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

const float EPS_N = 1e-4;
#define calcNormal(p, dFunc) normalize(\
    make_float3( EPS_N, -EPS_N, -EPS_N) * dFunc(p + make_float3( EPS_N, -EPS_N, -EPS_N)) + \
    make_float3(-EPS_N, -EPS_N,  EPS_N) * dFunc(p + make_float3(-EPS_N, -EPS_N,  EPS_N)) + \
    make_float3(-EPS_N,  EPS_N, -EPS_N) * dFunc(p + make_float3(-EPS_N,  EPS_N, -EPS_N)) + \
    make_float3( EPS_N,  EPS_N,  EPS_N) * dFunc(p + make_float3( EPS_N,  EPS_N,  EPS_N)))

ä»¥å‰ã«ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ã§ç´¹ä»‹ã—ãŸIFSã«ã‚ˆã‚‹MengerSpongeã®è·é›¢é–¢æ•°ã‚’CUDA Cã«ç§»æ¤ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

  • UnityÃ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚°ã«ã‚ˆã‚‹æ˜ åƒåˆ¶ä½œã®å®Ÿè·µæ‰‹æ³• | gam0022.net

Swizzle Operationã‚’æ‰‹å‹•å±•é–‹ã™ã‚‹ã®ãŒã—ã‚“ã©ã‹ã£ãŸã§ã™â€¦

ãƒ™ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒ«ç‰ˆã®absã‚„maxã¯è‡ªåˆ†ã§å®šç¾©ã™ã‚Œã°è§£æ±ºã—ã¾ã™ãŒã€Swizzle Operationã‚’CUDA Cä¸Šã§å†ç¾ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•ã¯ç§ã«ã¯åˆ†ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸã€‚

CUDA Cè¨€èªã€absã‚„maxã«ãƒ™ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒ«å‹ã®ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒç„¡ã„ã—ã€Swizzle Operationã‚‚ç„¡ã„ã‹ã‚‰ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ã‚¹ã§ç™ºç‹‚ã—ã¦ç²¾ç¥ãŒå´©å£Šã—ãŸğŸ¤¬ğŸ¤ªğŸ¤® pic.twitter.com/mRPmQTTcsb

— ãŒã‚€ (@gam0022) July 28, 2019

float dMenger(float3 z0, float3 offset, float scale) {
    float4 z = make_float4(z0, 1.0);
    for (int n = 0; n < 4; n++) {
        // z = abs(z);
        z.x = abs(z.x);
        z.y = abs(z.y);
        z.z = abs(z.z);
        z.w = abs(z.w);

        // if (z.x < z.y) z.xy = z.yx;
        if (z.x < z.y)
        {
            float x = z.x;
            z.x = z.y;
            z.y = x;
        }

        // if (z.x < z.z) z.xz = z.zx;
        if (z.x < z.z)
        {
            float x = z.x;
            z.x = z.z;
            z.z = x;
        }

        // if (z.y < z.z) z.yz = z.zy;
        if (z.y < z.z)
        {
            float y = z.y;
            z.y = z.z;
            z.z = y;
        }

        z *= scale;
        // z.xyz -= offset * (scale - 1.0);
        z.x -= offset.x * (scale - 1.0);
        z.y -= offset.y * (scale - 1.0);
        z.z -= offset.z * (scale - 1.0);

        if (z.z < -0.5 * offset.z * (scale - 1.0))
            z.z += offset.z * (scale - 1.0);
    }
    // return (length(max(abs(z.xyz) - make_float3(1.0, 1.0, 1.0), 0.0)) - 0.05) / z.w;
    return (length(make_float3(max(abs(z.x) - 1.0, 0.0), max(abs(z.y) - 1.0, 0.0), max(abs(z.z) - 1.0, 0.0))) - 0.05) / z.w;
}

float map(float3 p)
{
    float scale = 100;
    return dMenger((p - center) / scale, make_float3(1, 1, 1), 3.1) * scale;
}

C++ã‹ã‚‰Programã®åˆ©ç”¨

Programã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªC++ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’æ›¸ã‘ã°OKã§ã™ã€‚

Programã¨GPUã«é€ã‚‹æƒ…å ±ã®ãƒãƒƒãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚

Context        context = 0;
Program        pgram_raymarching_intersection = 0;
Program        pgram_raymarching_bounding_box = 0;

// ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚°ã®ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã® GeometryInstance ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã™
GeometryInstance createRaymrachingObject(
    const float3& center,
    const float3& size)
{
    Geometry raymarching = context->createGeometry();
    raymarching->setPrimitiveCount(1u);
    raymarching->setIntersectionProgram(pgram_raymarching_intersection);
    raymarching->setBoundingBoxProgram(pgram_raymarching_bounding_box);

    raymarching["center"]->setFloat(center);
    raymarching["size"]->setFloat(size);

    GeometryInstance gi = context->createGeometryInstance();
    gi->setGeometry(raymarching);
    return gi;
}

// ã‚¸ã‚ªãƒ¡ãƒˆãƒªã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’ã—ã¾ã™
// â€»ãƒ¬ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚°ã«ç›´æ¥é–¢ä¿‚ãªã„ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯çœç•¥ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™
void loadGeometry()
{
    // Set up Raymarching programs
    const char *ptx = sutil::getPtxString( SAMPLE_NAME, "optixRaymarching.cu" );
    pgram_raymarching_bounding_box = context->createProgramFromPTXString( ptx, "bounds" );
    pgram_raymarching_intersection = context->createProgramFromPTXString( ptx, "intersect" );

    // create geometry instances
    std::vector<GeometryInstance> gis;

    // Raymarcing
    gis.push_back(createRaymrachingObject(
        make_float3(278.0f, 120.0f, 278.0f),
        make_float3(100.0f, 100.0f, 100.0f)));
    setMaterial(gis.back(), diffuse, "diffuse_color", white);

    // Create geometry group
    GeometryGroup geometry_group = context->createGeometryGroup(gis.begin(), gis.end());
    geometry_group->setAcceleration( context->createAcceleration( "Trbvh" ) );
    context["top_object"]->set( geometry_group );
}

ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®æ”¹é€ 

ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®æ”¹é€ æ–¹æ³•ã¯NVIDIA Developer Forumsã«ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

  • How can I modify a simple example? - NVIDIA Developer Forums

Adding a new example is very simple:

  • Copy one of the optixIntro_01 (this is effectively optixHello) to optixIntro_10 folders,
  • rename it,
  • rename the project name in its copied CMakeLists.txt,
  • add your new subdirectory in the CMakeLists.txt one folder above,
  • rebuild the solution with CMake GUI. Done.

Your new project appears and would do the same thing as the example you copied it from. Now change it as you like.

å˜ä½“ã§å‹•ä½œã—ã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒšã—ã¦ãŠä½¿ã„ã„ãŸã ã‘ã¾ã™ã€‚

// Unity Y-Axis Billboard Shader by @gam0022
// https://gam0022.net/blog/2019/07/23/unity-y-axis-billboard-shader/
Shader "Unlit/Billboard"
{
    Properties
    {
        _MainTex ("Texture", 2D) = "white" {}
        [KeywordEnum(OFF, ALL_AXIS, Y_AXIS)] _BILLBOARD("Billboard Mode", Float) = 2
        _Cutoff ("Alpha Cutoff", Range(0, 1)) = 0.5
    }
    SubShader
    {
        Tags{ "Queue" = "AlphaTest" "RenderType" = "TransparentCutout"
                "IgnoreProjector" = "True" "DisableBatching" = "True" }

        Pass
        {
            CGPROGRAM
            #pragma vertex vert
            #pragma fragment frag
            // make fog work
            #pragma multi_compile_fog

            #include "UnityCG.cginc"
            #pragma multi_compile _BILLBOARD_OFF _BILLBOARD_ALL_AXIS _BILLBOARD_Y_AXIS

            struct appdata
            {
                float4 vertex : POSITION;
                float2 uv : TEXCOORD0;
            };

            struct v2f
            {
                float2 uv : TEXCOORD0;
                UNITY_FOG_COORDS(1)
                float4 vertex : SV_POSITION;
            };

            sampler2D _MainTex;
            float4 _MainTex_ST;
            
            float _Cutoff;

            v2f vert (appdata v)
            {
                v2f o;

                #if _BILLBOARD_OFF
                {
                    // ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãªã—ã®é€šå¸¸ã®åº§æ¨™å¤‰æ›
                    o.vertex = UnityObjectToClipPos(v.vertex);
                }
                #elif _BILLBOARD_ALL_AXIS
                {                   
                    // Meshã®åŸç‚¹ã‚’ModelViewå¤‰æ›
                    float3 viewPos = UnityObjectToViewPos(float3(0, 0, 0));
                    
                    // ã‚¹ã‚±ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã¨å›è»¢ï¼ˆå¹³è¡Œç§»å‹•ãªã—ï¼‰ã ã‘Modelå¤‰æ›ã—ã¦ã€Viewå¤‰æ›ã¯ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒƒãƒ—
                    float3 scaleRotatePos = mul((float3x3)unity_ObjectToWorld, v.vertex);
                    
                    // scaleRotatePosã‚’å³æ‰‹ç³»ã«å¤‰æ›ã—ã¦ã€viewPosã«åŠ ç®—
                    // æœ¬æ¥ã¯Viewå¤‰æ›ã§æš—é»™çš„ã«ZãŒåè»¢ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€
                    // Viewå¤‰æ›ã‚’ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒƒãƒ—ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯æ˜ç¤ºçš„ã«Zã‚’åè»¢ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚‹

                    o.vertex = mul(UNITY_MATRIX_P, float4(viewPos, 1));
                }
                #elif _BILLBOARD_Y_AXIS
                {
                    // Meshã®åŸç‚¹ã‚’ModelViewå¤‰æ›
                    float3 viewPos = UnityObjectToViewPos(float3(0, 0, 0));
                    
                    // ã‚¹ã‚±ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã¨å›è»¢ï¼ˆå¹³è¡Œç§»å‹•ãªã—ï¼‰ã ã‘Modelå¤‰æ›ã—ã¦ã€Viewå¤‰æ›ã¯ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒƒãƒ—
                    float3 scaleRotatePos = mul((float3x3)unity_ObjectToWorld, v.vertex);                
                    
                    // Viewè¡Œåˆ—ã‹ã‚‰å›è»¢è¡Œåˆ—ã®Yè»¸æˆåˆ†ã®ã¿ã‚’æŠ½å‡º
                    float3x3 ViewRotateY = float3x3(
                        1, UNITY_MATRIX_V._m01, 0,
                        0, UNITY_MATRIX_V._m11, 0,
                        0, UNITY_MATRIX_V._m21, -1// Zã®ç¬¦å·ã‚’åè»¢ã—ã¦å³æ‰‹ç³»ã«å¤‰æ›
                    );
                    viewPos += mul(ViewRotateY, scaleRotatePos);
                    
                    o.vertex = mul(UNITY_MATRIX_P, float4(viewPos, 1));
                }
                #endif

                o.uv = TRANSFORM_TEX(v.uv, _MainTex);
                UNITY_TRANSFER_FOG(o,o.vertex);
                return o;
            }

            fixed4 frag (v2f i) : SV_Target
            {
                // sample the texture
                fixed4 col = tex2D(_MainTex, i.uv);
                clip(col.a - _Cutoff);
                
                // apply fog
                UNITY_APPLY_FOG(i.fogCoord, col);
                return col;
            }
            ENDCG
        }
    }
}

WORMHOLEã®ãƒˆãƒ³ãƒãƒ«ã«ã¯8è§’æŸ±ã®foldRotateã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

ã“ã“ã¾ã§ä½¿ã£ãŸIFSã«ã‚ˆã‚‹MengerSpongeã®è·é›¢é–¢æ•°ã¨foldRotateã‚’çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ãŸæœ€çµ‚çš„ãªè·é›¢é–¢æ•°ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã“ã¡ã‚‰ã§ã™ã€‚ ãªã‚“ã¨ã€ã‚ãšã‹40è¡Œã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§è¤‡é›‘ãªå½¢çŠ¶ã‚’å®šç¾©ã§ãã¾ã—ãŸï¼ éå¸¸ã«çŸ­ã„ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã ã‘ã§è¤‡é›‘ãªãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã®ãŒè·é›¢é–¢æ•°ã®å¼·ã¿ã§ã™ã€‚

float3 _MengerOffset;
float _MengerScale;
float _MengerFold;

// IFSã«ã‚ˆã‚‹MengerSpongeã®è·é›¢é–¢æ•°
float dMenger(float3 z0, float3 offset, float scale) {
    float4 z = float4(z0, 1.0);
    for (int n = 0; n < 4; n++) {
        z = abs(z);

        if (z.x < z.y) z.xy = z.yx;
        if (z.x < z.z) z.xz = z.zx;
        if (z.y < z.z) z.yz = z.zy;

        z *= scale;
        z.xyz -= offset * (scale - 1.0);

        if (z.z < -0.5 * offset.z * (scale - 1.0))
            z.z += offset.z * (scale - 1.0);
    }
    return (length(max(abs(z.xyz) - float3(1.0, 1.0, 1.0), 0.0)) - 0.05) / z.w;
}

// 2Dã®å›è»¢è¡Œåˆ—ã®ç”Ÿæˆ
float2x2 rotate(in float a) {
    float s = sin(a), c = cos(a);
    return float2x2(c, s, -s, c);
}

// å›è»¢ã®fold
// https://www.shadertoy.com/view/Mlf3Wj
float2 foldRotate(in float2 p, in float s) {
    float a = PI / s - atan2(p.x, p.y);
    float n = PI2 / s;
    a = floor(a / n) * n;
    p = mul(rotate(a), p);
    return p;
}

// æœ€çµ‚çš„ãªè·é›¢é–¢æ•°
inline float DistanceFunction(float3 pos) {
    // å›è»¢foldã®é©ç”¨
    pos.yx = foldRotate(pos.yx, _MengerFold);

    return dMenger(pos, _MengerOffset, _MengerScale);
}
